thread.title: Nando's diners' fury as restaurants 'run out of chicken' on Bank Holiday
thread.title_full: Nando's diners' fury as restaurants 'run out of chicken' on Bank Holiday

author: Saphora Smith
title: Nando's diners' fury as restaurants 'run out of chicken' on Bank Holiday
text:
Wednesday 4 January 2017 11:06 BST Nando's: The chain famous for its chicken reportedly ran out of the meat 
Nandoâ€™s restaurants up and down the country ran out of chicken over the New Yearâ€™s bank holiday, angry diners claim. 
Branches including Dalston , Bedford, Aylesbury and Leamington-Spa were hit by a shortage of their signature meat, restaurant-goers claimed on social media. 
Lillie Bleasdale wrote on Twitter : â€œThis is an SOS. Leamington Nandoâ€™s has run out of chicken.â€ 
Another user tweeting under the handle @Cduffinhall wrote: â€œHow are Nandoâ€™s in Aylesbury closed because they have no chicken HAHAHAâ€ 
A user tweeting as Maddie wrote: "How has my local Nando's run out of chicken?...." @NandosUK @HeartShopping how can u run out of chicken!!! pic.twitter.com/LM8CiZn06n â€” Sunny C (@s_c007) January 2, 2017 
And @leonieb53 tweeted: â€œ@NandosUK #dalston how can nandos run out of their signature meat? What do u mean youâ€™ve RUN OUT of chicken fillets whilst Iâ€™m sitting hereâ€ How has my local Nando's run out of chicken?...ğŸ˜¶ â€” M a d d i e (@madsphillipino) January 2, 2017 @NandosUK it was Aylesbury. It was a complete joke. They blamed the bank holiday weekend for lack of deliveries. 
Sunny C posted a picture of a takeaway menu with all dishes marked â€œsold outâ€ adding the caption: â€œ@NandosUk @HeartShopping how can u run out of chicken!â€ This is an SOS. Leamington Nando's has run out of chicken. ğŸ” â€” Lillie Bleasdale (@Lillie_Bleas) January 1, 2017 @NandosUK goodbye dinner with the boys and Aylesbury have RAN OUT OF CHICKEN #Nandos #Fail #2017 #FirstWorldProblems â€” Jon Hammond (@Hammo_J) January 2, 2017 
Jon Hammond wrote on Twitter: â€œ@NandosUK goodbye dinner with the boys and Aylesbury have RUN OUT OF CHICKEN #Nandos #Fail #2017 #FirstWorldProblemsâ€ @NandosUK #dalston how can nandos run out of their signature meat? What do u mean you've RUN OUT of chicken fillets whilst I'm sitting hereğŸ˜£ â€” It's Just Me (@leonieb53) December 30, 2016 
A spokesman for the restaurant chain said it was that the branch in Aylesbury had run out of the meat but could not comment on the other complaints. @NandosUK Bedford Nandos has run out of chicken? What is going on! â€” Juten Ahmed (@xTheAsthmaticYT) December 23, 2016 Drive all the way to @NandosUK Aylesbury to arrive to no Mango & Lime and no fillets for a burger... ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡better find somewhere else! â€” Alex Harrison (@A1exHarrison) December 31, 2016 
The Aylesbury branch of the Portuguese chain, which prides itself on its Peri-Peri chicken, was reportedly caught short after a lack of deliveries over the New Yearâ€™s bank holiday. @NandosUK run out of chicken & sweet potatoes & attitude of staff & manager was appalling. said it was ok for me to take a McDonald's in! â€” Fairy Rock Chick (@MrsJoZanna) December 30, 2016 How are Nando's in Aylesbury closed because they have no chicken HAHAHAHA 
Diners complained it had taken several dishes off the menu because of a lack of poultry. 
A Nandoâ€™s spokesman said: â€œIt seems Aylesbury residents chose chicken over turkey this Christmas! 
â€œWeâ€™re sorry to any customers affected on the day, and are pleased to confirm that the restaurant was soon replenished.â€ More about:
